p: The plant products are complex set of primary and secondary metabolites, and their biological and pharmacological function may be due to synergies between different chemical components. The chemical components and levels of active compounds in these products are very diverse due to the plant interaction with the environment and other organisms. Since the manufacturing process of herbal medicinal products is very complex, it is preferable to use pure chemical compounds of plant origin due to easy of prescription, study the mechanism of pharmacological action and monitoring their side effects [ 9, 10].
